api_list.name: Search zip codes
api_list.description: Search for valid zip codes with starting digits

api_list.name: Zip Code Information
api_list.description: Retrieves the information of a particular zip code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mexico-zip-codes.p.rapidapi.com/codigo_postal/64630"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mexico-zip-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mexico-zip-codes.p.rapidapi.com/codigo_postal/{zip_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mexico-zip-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
